com.cleo.lexicom.beans

Class Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cleo.security.encryption.ConfigEncryption
      • com.cleo.lexicom.beans.Options
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.cleo.clone.LexCloneable, com.cleo.lexicom.roots.ICheckPaths, com.cleo.security.encryption.IConfigEncryption, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Options
extends com.cleo.security.encryption.ConfigEncryption
implements java.lang.Cloneable, com.cleo.clone.LexCloneable, com.cleo.lexicom.roots.ICheckPaths
    Options is used to get/set various VersaLex system level options. Refer to ILexiCom.getOptions().

    • Nested Class Summary
